zclMessagingCluster.h

00021 #ifndef _MESSAGINGCLUSTER_H
00022 #define _MESSAGINGCLUSTER_H
00023 
00024 #include <zcl.h>
00025 #include <clusters.h>
00026 /*******************************************************************************
00027                              Defines section
00028  ******************************************************************************/
00029 /***************************************************************************/
00034 #define DISPLAY_MESSAGE_DURATION_UNTIL_CHANGED 0xFFFF
00035 
00036 /*************************************************************************/
00039 #define MESSAGE_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT      0
00040 #define MESSAGE_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT      0
00041 
00042 /*************************************************************************/
00045 #define MESSAGE_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT               4
00046 
00047 #define DISPLAY_MESSAGE_COMMAND_ID  0x00
00048 #define CANCEL_MESSAGE_COMMAND_ID   0x01
00049 #define GET_LAST_MESSAGE_COMMAND_ID 0x00
00050 #define CONFIRM_MESSAGE_COMMAND_ID  0x01
00051 
00052 #define DEFINE_MESSAGING_CLUSTER_COMMANDS(clDisplayMessageInd, clCancelMessageInd, clGetLastMessageInd, clMessageConfirmationInd) \
00053   DEFINE_COMMAND(displayMessageCommand, 0x00, COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_RESPONSE_CONTROLLED_BY_PAYLOAD, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), clDisplayMessageInd), \
00054   DEFINE_COMMAND(cancelMessageCommand,  0x01, COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), clCancelMessageInd), \
00055   DEFINE_COMMAND(getLastMessageCommand,      0x00, COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), clGetLastMessageInd), \
00056   DEFINE_COMMAND(messageConfirmationCommand, 0x01, COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), clMessageConfirmationInd)
00057 
00058 #define MESSAGING_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00059   { \
00060     .id = MESSAGE_CLUSTER_ID, \
00061     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_APPLICATION_LINK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00062     .attributesAmount = MESSAGE_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00063     .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00064     .commandsAmount = MESSAGE_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00065     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00066   }
00067 
00068 #define MESSAGING_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00069   { \
00070     .id = MESSAGE_CLUSTER_ID, \
00071     .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_APPLICATION_LINK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00072     .attributesAmount = MESSAGE_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00073     .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00074     .commandsAmount = MESSAGE_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00075     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00076   }
00077 #define DEFINE_MESSAGING_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) MESSAGING_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)
00078 
00079 #define MESSAGING_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE_FLASH(clattributes, clcommands) \
00080   { \
00081     .id = MESSAGE_CLUSTER_ID, \
00082     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_APPLICATION_LINK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00083     .attributesAmount = MESSAGE_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00084     .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00085     .commandsAmount = MESSAGE_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00086     .commands = (FLASH_PTR uint8_t *)clcommands \
00087   }
00088 
00089 #define MESSAGING_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE_FLASH(clattributes, clcommands) \
00090   { \
00091     .id = MESSAGE_CLUSTER_ID, \
00092     .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_APPLICATION_LINK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00093     .attributesAmount = MESSAGE_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00094     .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00095     .commandsAmount = MESSAGE_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00096     .commands = (FLASH_PTR uint8_t *)clcommands \
00097   }
00098 #define DEFINE_MESSAGING_CLUSTER_FLASH(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) MESSAGING_CLUSTER_##cltype##_FLASH(clattributes, clcommands)
00099 BEGIN_PACK
00100 
00101 typedef union PACK
00102 {
00103   struct PACK
00104   {
00105     LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(4,(
00106       uint8_t transmissionType : 2,
00107       uint8_t importanceLevel : 2,
00108       uint8_t reserved : 3,
00109       uint8_t messageConfirmation : 1
00110     ))
00111   };
00112   uint8_t u8;
00113 } MessageControl_t;
00114 
00115 /***************************************************************************/
00119 typedef struct PACK
00120 {
00121   uint32_t            messageId;        
00122   MessageControl_t    messageControl;   
00123   uint32_t            startTime;        
00124   uint16_t            duration;         
00125   uint8_t             message[1];       
00126 } DisplayMessage_t;
00127 
00128 /***************************************************************************/
00132 typedef struct PACK
00133 {
00134   uint32_t            messageId;        
00135   MessageControl_t    messageControl;   
00136 } CancelMessage_t;
00137 
00138 typedef struct PACK
00139 {
00140   uint32_t      messageId;
00141   ZCL_UTCTime_t confirmationTime;
00142 } MessageConfirmation_t;
00143 END_PACK
00144 
00145 
00146 /***************************************************************************/
00150 typedef struct
00151 {
00153   struct
00154   {
00155     ZCL_CommandId_t       id;       
00156     ZclCommandOptions_t   options;  
00157 
00163     ZCL_Status_t (*displayMessage)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, DisplayMessage_t *payload);
00164   } displayMessageCommand;
00165 
00167   struct
00168   {
00169     ZCL_CommandId_t       id;       
00170     ZclCommandOptions_t   options;  
00171 
00177     ZCL_Status_t (*cancelMessage)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, CancelMessage_t *payload);
00178   } cancelMessageCommand;
00180   struct
00181   {
00182     ZCL_CommandId_t       id;       
00183     ZclCommandOptions_t   options;  
00184 
00190     ZCL_Status_t (*getLastMessage)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, void *payload);
00191   } getLastMessageCommand;
00193   struct
00194   {
00195     ZCL_CommandId_t       id;       
00196     ZclCommandOptions_t   options;  
00197 
00203     ZCL_Status_t (*messageConfirmation)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, MessageConfirmation_t *payload);
00204   } messageConfirmationCommand;
00205 } MessagingClusterCommands_t;
00206 
00207 #endif // _MESSAGINGCLUSTER_H
